body_html: Although it's not yet complete, the new dataset performance guide is available at: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/performance/datasets_performance.md It doesn't include FP16 performance recommendations as that usually occurs on the accelerator device (i.e. GPU/TPU), while the input pipelines run on the attached CPU. Hope this helps!

body: Although it's not yet complete, the new dataset performance guide is available at: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/performance/datasets_performance.md It doesn't include FP16 performance recommendations as that usually occurs on the accelerator device (i.e. GPU/TPU), while the input pipelines run on the attached CPU. Hope this helps!
